name: Dragonia
overview: The player plays as Cebrenia, an apprentice wizard who has to prove himself to the Elder wizards by finding the magical Golden Crown, symbol of freedom and peace on the doomed city of Dragonia. Dragonia is an adventure game with light RPG elements. The player can control his actions by scrolling and selecting or combining the icons on the interface of the screen. Each icon represents an action such as picking/dropping objects, talk, use, wear, pray, and listen among others.
